modName: Naaxs Tomb Basic Dungeon -Part of a Tutorial Series-
summary: A bare dungeon ready for clutter, lighting, NPC\'s and more. Part of the BestInSlot Tutorial Series. - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7IW9067yfZw
descriptionHtml:
Hey there!
I\'m Best In Slot, and I\'m running a Creation Kit series over on Youtube. 
Episode 3 of the tutorial series dealt with the basics of building a dungeon.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7IW9067yfZw

Everybody is going to need a dungeon to work on for the next few videos as we go about adding NPC\'s, Clutter, Lighting, Enemies, Quests and Exits and more! So, if you want a basic dungeon to work from, here you go! 

INSTALLING : To Install, simply drag NaaxsTomb.esp into your Skyrim data folder. Then click \'Data\' on the launcher and make sure it\'s ticked.

UINSTALLING : Untick the ESP file in your launcher, or merely delete it from your data folder. 

TO GET THERE : To enter the dungeon, type \'coc naaxstomb\' into your console. Without apostrophes.
author: Best In Slot - Dying Atheist
